summary.para: Gets the description for rasterizer state that you used to create the rasterizer-state object.

param.name: pDesc
param.para: A pointer to a structure that receives a description of the rasterizer state. This rasterizer state can specify forced sample count.

remarks.para: You use the description for rasterizer state in a call to the method to create the rasterizer-state object.

summary.para: The rasterizer-state interface holds a description for rasterizer state that you can bind to the rasterizer stage. This rasterizer-state interface supports forced sample count.
